alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 2:51PM MST until February 21 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Dixie, Elk City, and Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 4 AM Tuesday to 4 AM PST Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 4 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
